value.0:
The kasha is a crystal traditionally used by the Cereans as a meditation tool. They are used to clear the mind of distractions in order to create a perfect meditation environment. Patterns are scribed on each face of the crystal to harness its full energy potential, possibly created by Bi-Dar Tyunda thousands of years before.

When used as a lightsaber crystal, it helps clear the wielder's mind of distractions, even during tense combat. It is unknown whether these crystals are usable by species other than Cereans, or if the crystals are specifically designed for their use.
